lead_paragraph: Dellin Betances gave up a run, so did Andrew Miller and Aroldis Chapman almost got nicked, too. A surprising sequence for the Yankees' vaunted bullpen trio.

headline.print_headline: Crawford's 3 Errors vs Yanks Send Giants to 6th Loss in Row
headline.main: Crawford's 3 Errors vs Yanks Send Giants to 6th Loss in Row
